Class Piece

  • java.lang.Object
    • classes.piece.Piece
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GestionCompatibilite, ProprieteManagerInterface, VerifCompatibilite
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Engine, Exterior, Interior, Transmission

    public class Piece
extends java.lang.Object
implements ProprieteManagerInterface, GestionCompatibilite, VerifCompatibilite
    Classe possedant des methodes permettant de gerer les pieces
